sn33.3:1.2: Then the wanderer Vacchagotta said to the Buddha:
sn33.3:1.3: “What is the cause, Master Gotama, what is the reason why these various misconceptions arise in the world? …”
sn33.3:1.6: “Vaccha, it is because of not knowing perception, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation …”
